actions.name: AssociateKmsKey
actions.description: Grants permission to associate the specified AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) with the specified log group

actions.name: CancelExportTask
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel an export task if it is in PENDING or RUNNING state

actions.name: CreateDelivery
actions.description: Grants permission to create a delivery connecting a delivery source to a delivery destination

actions.name: CreateExportTask
actions.description: Grants permission to create an ExportTask which allows you to efficiently export data from a Log Group to your Amazon S3 bucket

actions.name: CreateLogAnomalyDetector
actions.description: Grants permission to create a log anomaly detector

actions.name: CreateLogDelivery
actions.description: Grants permission to create the log delivery

actions.name: CreateLogGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new log group with the specified name

actions.name: CreateLogStream
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new log stream with the specified name

actions.name: DeleteAccountPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a data protection policy attached to an account

actions.name: DeleteDataProtectionPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a data protection policy attached to a log group

actions.name: DeleteDelivery
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery

actions.name: DeleteDeliveryDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery destination after all associated deliveries are deleted

actions.name: DeleteDeliveryDestinationPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery destination policy associated with a delivery destination

actions.name: DeleteDeliverySource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery source after all associated deliveries are deleted

actions.name: DeleteDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the destination with the specified name

actions.name: DeleteLogAnomalyDetector
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a log anomaly detector

actions.name: DeleteLogDelivery
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the log delivery information for specified log delivery

actions.name: DeleteLogGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the log group with the specified name

actions.name: DeleteLogStream
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a log stream

actions.name: DeleteMetricFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a metric filter associated with the specified log group

actions.name: DeleteQueryDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a saved CloudWatch Logs Insights query definition

actions.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy from this account

actions.name: DeleteRetentionPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the retention policy of the specified log group

actions.name: DeleteSubscriptionFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a subscription filter associated with the specified log group

actions.name: DescribeAccountPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a data protection policy attached to an account

actions.name: DescribeDeliveries
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of deliveries an account

actions.name: DescribeDeliveryDestinations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of delivery destinations an account

actions.name: DescribeDeliverySources
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of delivery sources in an account

actions.name: DescribeDestinations
actions.description: Grants permission to return all the destinations that are associated with the AWS account making the request

actions.name: DescribeExportTasks
actions.description: Grants permission to return all the export tasks that are associated with the AWS account making the request

actions.name: DescribeLogGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to return all the log groups that are associated with the AWS account making the request

actions.name: DescribeLogStreams
actions.description: Grants permission to return all the log streams that are associated with the specified log group

actions.name: DescribeMetricFilters
actions.description: Grants permission to return all the metrics filters associated with the specified log group

actions.name: DescribeQueries
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of CloudWatch Logs Insights queries that are scheduled, executing, or have been executed recently in this account

actions.name: DescribeQueryDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of your saved CloudWatch Logs Insights query definitions

actions.name: DescribeResourcePolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to return all the resource policies in this account

actions.name: DescribeSubscriptionFilters
actions.description: Grants permission to return all the subscription filters associated with the specified log group

actions.name: DisassociateKmsKey
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate the associated AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) from the specified log group

actions.name: FilterLogEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve log events, optionally filtered by a filter pattern from the specified log group

actions.name: GetDataProtectionPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a data protection policy attached to a log group

actions.name: GetDelivery
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a single delivery

actions.name: GetDeliveryDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a single delivery destination

actions.name: GetDeliveryDestinationPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a delivery destination policy attached to a delivery destination

actions.name: GetDeliverySource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a single delivery source

actions.name: GetLogAnomalyDetector
actions.description: Grants permission to get a log anomaly detector

actions.name: GetLogDelivery
actions.description: Grants permission to get the log delivery information for specified log delivery

actions.name: GetLogEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve log events from the specified log stream

actions.name: GetLogGroupFields
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the fields that are included in log events in the specified log group, along with the percentage of log events that contain each field

actions.name: GetLogRecord
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all the fields and values of a single log event

actions.name: GetQueryResults
actions.description: Grants permission to return the results from the specified query

actions.name: Link
actions.description: Grants permission to share CloudWatch resources with a monitoring account

actions.name: ListAnomalies
actions.description: Grants permission to list all anomalies detected in the AWS account making the request

actions.name: ListLogAnomalyDetectors
actions.description: Grants permission to return all the anomaly detectors that are associated with the AWS account making the request

actions.name: ListLogDeliveries
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the log deliveries for specified account and/or log source

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified resource

actions.name: ListTagsLogGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified log group

actions.name: PutAccountPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a data protection policy at account level to detect and redact sensitive information from log events

actions.name: PutDataProtectionPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a data protection policy to detect and redact sensitive information from log events

actions.name: PutDeliveryDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to create/update a delivery destination

actions.name: PutDeliveryDestinationPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a delivery destination policy to a delivery destination

actions.name: PutDeliverySource
actions.description: Grants permission to create/update a delivery source

actions.name: PutDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a Destination

actions.name: PutDestinationPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update an access policy associated with an existing Destination

actions.name: PutLogEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to upload a batch of log events to the specified log stream

actions.name: PutMetricFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a metric filter and associates it with the specified log group

actions.name: PutQueryDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a query definition

actions.name: PutResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a resource policy allowing other AWS services to put log events to this account

actions.name: PutRetentionPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to set the retention of the specified log group

actions.name: PutSubscriptionFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a subscription filter and associates it with the specified log group

actions.name: StartLiveTail
actions.description: Grants permission to start a Live Tail session in CloudWatch Logs

actions.name: StartQuery
actions.description: Grants permission to schedule a query of a log group using CloudWatch Logs Insights

actions.name: StopLiveTail
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a Live Tail session that is in progress

actions.name: StopQuery
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a CloudWatch Logs Insights query that is in progress

actions.name: TagLogGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update the specified tags for the specified log group

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update the specified tags for the specified resource

actions.name: TestMetricFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to test the filter pattern of a metric filter against a sample of log event messages

actions.name: Unmask
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch unmasked log events that have been redacted with a data protection policy

actions.name: UntagLogGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the specified log group

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the specified resource

actions.name: UpdateAnomaly
actions.description: Grants permission to update an anomaly reported by a log anomaly detector

actions.name: UpdateLogAnomalyDetector
actions.description: Grants permission to update a log anomaly detector

actions.name: UpdateLogDelivery
actions.description: Grants permission to update the log delivery information for specified log delivery
